queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.rules[1] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=controller does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

metadata.name={{release-name-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-ingress-nginx-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
metadata.name={{release-name-uffizzi-cluster-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-rbac-proxy}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
